definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: Thrice in the year shall all your menchildren appear before the LORD God， the God of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 你们一切男丁要一年三次朝见主耶和华以色列的神。

sentences.english: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed; and the number of the men was about five thousand.
sentences.chinese: 但听道之人，有许多信的，男丁数目，约有五千。

sentences.english: Of the sons of Shechaniah; the son of Jahaziel, and with him three hundred males.
sentences.chinese: 属示迦尼的子孙有雅哈悉的儿子，同着他有男丁三百。

sentences.english: These are the other male descendants of Manasseh son of Joseph by their clans.
sentences.chinese: 这些按着宗族，都是约瑟儿子玛拿西子孙的男丁。

sentences.english: Of the sons of Shecaniah, the son of Jahaziel; and with him three hundred males.
sentences.chinese: 属示迦尼的子孙有雅哈悉的儿子，同着他有男丁三百。

sentences.english: Three times a year all your men are to appear before the Sovereign Lord , the God of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 你们一切男丁，要一年三次朝见主耶和华以色列的神。

sentences.english: During WW1 my family men were in the Prussian army.
sentences.chinese: 一战期间，我家族的男丁在普鲁士军队服役。

definition: able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)
number of people in a family/population/(old) adult males/male servants
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
the old and the young/the youngest member of the family
wives and concubines (of a polygamous man)/harem
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
(old) servant hired to keep guard, run errands etc
